name: Rascam-server
tagline: RasCam is a java server for controlling the Raspberry Pi camera board.
body:
### Welcome to Rascam Server.
This project is designed to provide a simple json / http service for the Raspberry-Pi camera module and make it available to my IOS client application. The service will in future allow a username / password secured via https. 



```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Features
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
